data.title: Philippines [Rankings 2024]
data.meta_description: The University of the East - Philippines ranked 20th in the Philippines and 6245th in the World 2024 overall rankings, while got 967th place for Firefighting and Fire Science. See all 32 academic rankings both national and global.
data.meta_site_name: EduRank.org - Discover university rankings by location
data.text:
University of the East - Philippines: Rankings

Updated: February 29, 2024

EduRank

The University of the East - Philippines ranked 20th in the Philippines, 6245th in the global 2024 rating, and scored in 32 research topics. The University of the East - Philippines ranking is based on 3 factors: research output (EduRank's index has 402 academic publications and 5,465 citations attributed to the university), non-academic reputation, and the impact of 37 notable alumni.

Ranking Category #6245 of 14,131 In the World #2337 of 5,830 In Asia #20 of 229 In the Philippines #8 of 35 In Manila #967 of 1,053 For Firefighting and Fire Science #2890 of 3,874 For Math Teachers #3488 of 6,493 For Sociology #1070 of 7,738 For Alumni Impact #9865 of 14,131 For Non-academic Prominence
